name: Jemeyah
description:
Jemeyah the strange robot a new adventure games for everyone.

Fight the monster who  conquered our world.
Join and Explore the world with jemeyah the strange robot from the future.

Featuring:
* 3 Beautiful Stages
* Slash many dangerous monsters!
* 1 Epic Boss
* Stunning Graphics
* Offline games
* Smooth user interface.
* Music and sound effects.
* Suitable for kids & all ages.
